innhold.avsnitt: If you have a child through a surrogate

As the biological father of the child you will normally be entitled to the entire parental benefit period. Your spouse or registered partner may be entitled to the parental benefit if he adopts the child as his stepchild and there are days remaining in the parental benefit period.
Please note that paternity as the biological father must be approved in Norway in order for you to be entitled to the parental benefit.
If you are both adoptive parents of the child
You will then have 15 weeks each and a joint period that you can share. The parental benefit period commences when care of the child is assumed. You choose which of you will start the period.
